Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery

This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XQuery.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeAbstractXQueryExpressionRunner A base class for implementations of an XQuery expression runner.
AeBPWSXQueryExpressionRunner Implements an XQuery 1.0 expression runner.
AeStaticQueryContext This class extends the Saxon static query context in order to override certain functionality, such as namespace/prefix lookups.
AeWSBPELXQueryExpressionRunner A WS-BPEL implementation of an XQuery expression runner.
AeWSBPELXQueryLinkVariableResolver A WS-BPEL Xquery variable resolver.
AeWSBPELXQueryVariableResolver A WS-BPEL Xquery variable resolver.
AeXQueryExpressionResult This class wraps the Document that is produced when an XQuery expression is executed using Saxon.
AeXQueryExpressionTypeConverter An implementation of a type converter for Saxon XQuery.
AeXQueryFunction This class wraps a generic ActiveBPEL expression function into something that the Saxon XQuery processor can use.
AeXQueryFunctionLibrary This class implements a Saxon XQuery function library from a generic ActiveBPEL expression function context and a default Saxon expression context.
AeXQuerySchemaTypeVisitor A schema type visitor that will convert a schema type object to a Saxon Value.
AeXQueryTypedExpressionResult A helper class for creating a List of objects from the result of a Saxon XQuery.
AeXQueryTypeMapper This class is used to convert Saxon AtomicValue instances to Jave/Ae objects.
 

Exception Summary
AeXQueryTypeConversionException A runtime exception that can be thrown when there is a problem converting a type in the XQuery type conversion layer.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery Description

This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XQuery. This implementation uses the Saxon library in order to run expressions written in the XQuery language.
